statements: SELECT * FROM account_balance_monitoring WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT account_id, account_balance, customer_id FROM account_balance_monitoring WHERE customer_id = 'a2e0f4b0-16ae-4c57-b960-f81fac20f0c7';
SELECT customer_id, last_activity_date FROM account_balance_monitoring ORDER BY last_activity_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM account_balance_monitoring WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM account_balance_monitoring WHERE account_id = 'f504836e-3f13-4c94-b0f7-5d6cb42f8dd8' AND last_activity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM account_balance_monitoring WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY last_activity_date DESC
SELECT account_id, customer_id, account_balance FROM account_balance_monitoring WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM account_balance_monitoring WHERE last_activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY account_balance ASC
SELECT account_id, customer_id, SUM(account_balance) AS total_balance FROM account_balance_monitoring GROUP BY account_id, customer_id HAVING total_balance > 5000 ORDER BY total_balance DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM account_balance_monitoring WHERE account_balance < 0
SELECT * FROM Accounts;
SELECT customer_id, balance FROM Accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, customer_id FROM Accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical';
SELECT MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM Accounts;
SELECT * FROM Accounts WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM Accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT account_id, alert_type FROM Alerts JOIN Accounts ON Alerts.account_id = Accounts.account_id WHERE Alerts.alert_type = 'Critical' AND balance < 5000;
SELECT AVG(balance) AS average_balance FROM Accounts GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(balance) > 2000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(alert_id) AS alert_count FROM Alerts GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(alert_id) > 5 ORDER BY alert_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM account_balances;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, balance, last_activity FROM account_balances WHERE account_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Suspicious Activity' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT activity_id, account_id, activity_description FROM unusual_activities WHERE account_id = 200 ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY last_activity DESC;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE balance < 5000 AND last_activity > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY account_id ASC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM account_balances GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_balance > 5000 ORDER BY total_balance DESC;

SELECT a.account_id, b.alert_type, b.alert_message FROM account_balances a INNER JOIN customer_alerts b ON a.account_id = b.customer_id WHERE b.alert_type = 'Suspicious' ORDER BY b.alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM unusual_activities WHERE account_id IN (SELECT account_id FROM account_balances WHERE balance < 1000) ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM AccountBalances ORDER BY account_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT account_id, balance FROM AccountBalances WHERE customer_id = 10
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 5
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM Alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2021-01-01'
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT account_id, balance FROM AccountBalances ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com%'
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount FROM Transactions
SELECT account_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM Transactions GROUP BY account_id
SELECT * FROM account_balances;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM unusual_activity_alerts WHERE activity_type = 'Suspicious';
SELECT account_id, timestamp FROM customer_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High Risk' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE balance < 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM customer_alerts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM low_balance_alerts WHERE balance_threshold BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT account_id, activity_type FROM unusual_activity_alerts WHERE activity_type = 'Suspicious' AND account_id = 12345;
